verses.roman:
'gūḍha mora hṛdaya tuñi jānilā kemane?'
eta kahi' rūpe kailā dṛḍha āliṅgane

synonyms: gūḍha—very confidential; mora—My; hṛdaya—heart; tuñi—you; jānilā—knew; kemane—how; eta kahi'-saying this; rūpe—to Rūpa Gosvāmī; kailā—did; dṛḍha āliṅgane—firm embracing.
translation: My heart is very confidential. How did you know My mind in this way?" After saying this, He firmly embraced Rūpa Gosvāmī.
